registers.name: Abstract Commands
registers.register:
Access the register specified by \Fregno.
When 1, execute the program in the Program Buffer before performing the read/write.
When 1, execute the program in the Program Buffer after performing the read/write.
0: Copy data from \Rdatazero into the specified register.
1: Copy data from the specified register into \Rdatazero.
(If XLEN is greater than 32, more {\tt data} registers are involved.)
Number of the register to access, as described in Table~\ref{tab:regno}.
